title: Commencement of business
description: Invested shareholders must confirm payment and office address

title: Renewal of License
description: License holders must apply for renewal by the specified date.

title: Tax Payment
description: Taxpayers must pay their taxes on time to avoid penalties.

title: Employee Benefits
description: Employees can enroll in benefit programs during the enrollment period.

title: Project Submission
description: Students must submit their projects by the specified deadline.
